title: How to Talk to Hot Women The Secrets of Making Conversation Sexy
description:
Did you ever wonder why some guys have such fun, playful,and flirtatious conversations with women? While your conversation more closely resembles a train wreck than a seduction? In this guide you will learn how to create compelling, flirtatious, and sexy conversations with hot women.

Even if you're currently shy or inexperienced with women, this book will provide tips, tricks, and tactics for making talking to women easy and fun. And more importantly, it will provide you with the tools you need to seduce her.

There is no reason to continue to struggle in conversations when the information in this guide will transform you into the type of guy who has women eating out of the palm of his hand.

In this guide you'll learn:

- How to Avoid Awkward Silences

- 5 "conversation killers" and how to avoid them

- How to become a master storyteller

- The best conversation topics for talking to hot women

- 6 Traits your conversations must possess

- The four best flirting techniques for turning women on

- Master the art of "teasing" (the ultimate flirting tool)

- How to ensure you have great first dates

 Language: English |
 EPUB + MOBI | ISBN-10: N/A | 
 ASIN: B006PA7VEW |
